entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near midnight.
